evidence.claim: SalesTable utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing solutions.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA regulations for secure handling of health data.
SalesTable leverages Snowflake for data warehousing solutions.
Healthcare transactions are processed using FHIR standards.
SalesTable employs Apache Kafka for real-time data streaming and integration.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of involvement with X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
